com.steelypip.powerups.hydraxml

Class HydraXMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.steelypip.powerups.hydraxml.LevelTracker
      • com.steelypip.powerups.hydraxml.HydraXMLParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<HydraXML>

    public class HydraXMLParser
extends LevelTracker
implements java.lang.Iterable<HydraXML>
    This class wraps various types of input stream to create a HydraXML parser. An optional HydraXMLBuilder can be supplied, which gives control over the HydraXML implementation that is actually constructed. HydraXML elements are read off the stream using readElement. Alternatively you can simply iterate over the parser.

      Constructs a parser from a Reader and supplies a default builder that optimises for JSON-like structures.
      HydraXMLParser(java.io.Reader reader, HydraXMLBuilder builder)
      Constructs a parser from a Reader and a HydraXMLBuilder.

        public HydraXMLParser(CharRepeater rep,
                      HydraXMLBuilder builder)
        Constructs a parser from a CharRepeater and a HydraXMLBuilder. Character repeaters are streams with unlimited pushback.
        Parameters:
        rep - the input source
        builder - used to construct the HydraXML objects

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Reads ahead on the input stream to determine if there are more MinXML expressions.
        Returns:
